metadata.dc:description: Contribution of one case of right paratesticular rhabdomyosarcoma in a 3-year and 4-month old male patient. Following radical orchiectomy and clinical staging, grading is IRS Group I (fully resected localized disease). Subsequently, the patient received 7 polychemotherapy courses and was found to be asymptomatic 4 years after treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Rabdomiosarcoma paratesticular.
[Paratesticular rhabdomyosarcoma].
